job_details.Functieomschrijving: The majority of the resources would be supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins) to further drive our overall AI strategy across the firm. In addition to that, we have ongoing AI R&D initiatives that we'd look to leverage some of these roles to help us continue driving the initiatives
job_details.full_text:
Senior / Lead AI Engineer

The majority of the resources would be supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins) to further drive our overall AI strategy across the firm. In addition to that, we have ongoing AI R&D initiatives that we'd look to leverage some of these roles to help us continue driving the initiatives

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very brief and lacks specific details about the tasks, technologies, or models involved. It mentions 'AI strategy' and 'AI R&D initiatives' but does not provide enough information to classify it as an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. It could potentially be a role focused on the use of AI tools or a more general AI strategy role, which aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive our overall AI strategy across the firm' indicates a need to understand and align technical efforts with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: drive our overall AI strategy across the firm

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'AI R&D initiatives' suggests involvement in research and development of AI, which falls under modeling.
The phrase 'supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins)' implies building software components that integrate AI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: supporting the development of assets (e.g., plugins)
